channel.title: Need 24.7 hoster (limited time only)
channel.description:
Hello moparscape I am the owner of 123koscape and we need you help on hosting,I am hosting from my computer we are up 16 hrs a day and need 24.7,So we need someone to host for us for a short amount of time.. vps cost 39$ and we are 20$ away so if you can help us host for a short time you will be rewarded with.. -admin on are server -also maybe 10$ after we purchase vps here are forums... *
any voulunteers post below!

item.title: Need 24.7 hoster (limited time only)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

requesting a programmer/hoster is not allowed, you’re just going to have to do it yourself

Read full topic
